item.description:
Level 2 open to Sea Kayaks only due to potential of winds and waves

View our About Page for information on Skill Levels from the menu bar on left.

You must have an "all around light" on your kayak which can be viewed from 360 degrees. Also glow sticks and or a waterproof flashlight or headlight are recommended.


We'll meet at the Bicentenial Park at the end of the seawall at Hampton's North Beach. The Bicentenial Park is at the intersection of Ocean Boulevard Rt.1A and High Street in Hampton across from Cinnamon Rainbows Surf Shop. Bring a picnic dinner to enjoy at the picnic tables prior to our launch at about 8:30pm. We'll paddle aprox 3 miles to a loacation on the South side of Rocky Bend aka Boars Head and view the Fireworks which begin at 9:30pm

Click photo above for view of launch location at Bicentenial Park

Participants in this paddle should have experience as a level 2 kayaker as described on our About Us page Goto the link below to read the kayak skill levels. See the photo above for a view of the area and Launch Site.

NE Seacoast Paddlers Kayaker Skill Levels

Life vests aka PFDs must be worn when paddling with this group

Directions:

* Take Rt. 1a Ocean Boulevard to North Beach Hampton
* Bicentenial Park is at the Traffic Lights at intersection of High St. & Ocean Boulevard
* After dropping off kayak and gear there is a public parking lot next to Cinnamon Rainbows Surf Shop

Google Maps directions to Bicentenial Park North Beach Hampton
item.name: Fireworks Viewing Hampton Beach Paddle
